author: Adriana

review: Ok I've had a roku stick for about a year, and wanted a stick for my bed room so i got a fire stick for my living room TV. Both work well. I'll review both. The ROKU works great for me, every now and then I had to reset it to get Netfix to work. not that big of a issue, but about once a month or so i had to reset thru the settings for Netflix, Amazon prime worked without issue. The fire stick runs Netflix great, hulu and of course Amazon prime, the fire stick is Much faster and much more responsive than the roku. Audio and video are equal on both sticks, got 1080p with both. Both came with remote controls and work almost identically (the roku is way less responsive it takes more clicks and runs past what you want often.) The fire stick came with a HDMI extender that will work better for wall mounted TVs, the fire stick is 10 to 15 dollars cheaper. So if you are going to buy a stick, I think the Fire stick is better just slightly.
author: Mark
